summary: This document is an email chain from June 1, 2020, between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel regarding the transfer of subpoenaed bank records from FirstBank Puerto Rico to a case agent for the Epstein investigation. It shows coordination to deliver evidence to the Southern District of New York office.

events.title: Coordination for Bank Record Transfer
events.description: Email correspondence regarding the transfer of subpoenaed bank records from FirstBank Puerto Rico to a case agent for the Epstein investigation, to be delivered to the SDNY office.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated June 1, 2020, concerning the Epstein case investigation.
It references subpoena returns from FirstBank Puerto Rico related to the 2018 SDNY investigation.
The correspondence shows coordination to deliver these bank records to a case agent at the SDNY office.
The email involves Assistant United States Attorney personnel in the Southern District of New York.
The document indicates ongoing investigative activity regarding financial records in the Epstein case as of mid-2020.
